EmailTemplate.name: 18-Cable-Service Provider-Email-AngaCom eDM-T0020H.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Meet Nokia’s experts at ANGACOM, 12-14 Jun
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> We create the technology to connect the world ANGA COM 12-14 June, 2018 Cologne, Germany ANGA COM exhibition and conference is Europe’s leading business platform for broadband operators and content providers. Join the event and meet Nokia’s experts to discuss how our future-forward solutions can help your networks and business evolve, while keeping OPEX low.
Click below to add the event to your calendar: {{my.Calendar Token}} <[[#]]>
Is there a challenge keeping you awake at night? Tell us and our experts will answer your questions on-site. We look forward to seeing you in June!
Kind regards, Your Nokia team Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
